name: koel
description: Koel is a web based personal music streaming server. It scans local audio files and serves them through a clean web player and mobile friendly UI, allowing users to enjoy their collection from anywhere while keeping full control of the files.

features.title: Library Scanning
features.description: Automatic music library scanning with metadata and album art fetching. Organize music effortlessly

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Beautiful, responsive web player with modern interface. Enjoy music on any device

features.title: Playlist Management
features.description: Create custom playlists and smart playlists with rules. Curate your listening experience

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Build and manage playback queue with drag-and-drop. Control what plays next

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find songs, albums, and artists quickly with advanced search. Navigate large libraries easily

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Individual user accounts with personal playlists and preferences. Share server with family
